problem.p: Here a starting point for you: create an arch that is 25m tall, spans 75m, and supports a load of 100kN/m. Use the arch simulator to determine the compressive force in the arch.

choicegroup.label: Here a starting point for you: create an arch that is 25m tall, spans 75m, and supports a load of 100kN/m. Use the arch simulator to determine the compressive force in the arch.
